name: MODERN NAVAL COMBAT
description:
This game is a naval battle simulation real-time strategy game.
Our goal is to restore as far as possible a long-sea battle from the 1970s to around 2020. Tired of bombarding the battleship's main gun? Let's get some high-tech.

camp:
The Chinese navy that has developed rapidly since the 21st century
Old but still very deadly Russian Navy
And the unparalleled U.S. Navy


unit:

Each camp has almost all marine equipment from the 1960s, which refers to the first three decades of the 21st century.
They include:
Aircraft carriers, cruisers, destroyers, frigates, conventional submarines and nuclear submarines.

The aircraft carrier is equipped with the main fighters and attack aircraft of various countries including F / A-18, F14, F35, Su 33, and J-15.
There are also various types of helicopters, early warning aircraft, anti-submarine aircraft, electronic warfare aircraft

In order to be able to restore a modernized combat equipment, we have unique uses and have an irreplaceable role in combat.

set up:
The game has many settings to restore realistic naval battles.

Each unit has its radar reflection cross-sectional area. Fighters like the F35 can only get close enough to be detected by enemy radar.

The range of the missile is a dynamic concept. If the target aircraft flies head-on without changing course, the missile's hit rate is high. But if the target makes an S-shaped maneuver or turns around to escape. Then the missile is likely to be thrown away. To this end, we will enable players to set the launch logic of each missile on each ship to achieve the best defense effect based on the situation at sea.

Electronic warfare aircraft can interfere with the detection range of enemy radars, and can even launch anti-radiation missiles to eliminate enemy units with radar turned on.

In addition, each ship has its own noise figure, and even when sailing at different speeds, the noise will be different. If you do not grasp it well, it will be discovered by the enemy's initiative or passive sonar. Yes, sonar is also divided into active and passive. The active sonar detection capability is stronger than the passive sonar, but if it is used indiscriminately, it will definitely expose its position.

Custom AI:
We will also release custom AI functions that allow players to design their own computer behaviors.
